game.name: Discarded
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Discarded is action rougelike, arena shooter where you face waves of relentless enemies. You’re alone and outgunned - move fast, shoot faster, dodge the bullets and upgrade on the fly. Keep up with the pressure or get shredded like the rest.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Discarded is action rougelike, arena shooter where you face waves of relentless enemies. You’re alone and outgunned - move fast, shoot faster, dodge the bullets and upgrade on the fly. Keep up with the pressure or get shredded like the rest.
